short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switch between links on a page with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Press CMD + K to open a modal that lets you switch between all the links on a page!

Instructions
- search for links, buttons, clickable divs, and text inputs with CMD + K and type link text
- press enter to press the links, buttons, divs, and focus inputs
- pick between links with arrow keys and tab

Features
- recently visited links are highlighted first!
- press CMD + Enter to open links in a new tab!
